message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. Let me know if that's something you're interested in!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $15000?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $18000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for the product's value.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to keep the price closer to my initial target. Could we possibly negotiate down to $16000?

I understand you're still trying to get closer to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $17000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my target price. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose $16500 as a final offer.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $17000, Bob. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I can include a free maintenance package worth $1000. If you're willing to meet me at $17000, I'll include this package, which will make the total value of the deal even more attractive. What do you think?
